publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-457 Mr Kenny MacAskill: Scottish Flight Supplements—That the Parliament notes the outrageous flight supplements charged on holiday flights from Scotland; acknowledges that there is no justification for the supplements currently administered on Scottish flights; and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government in support of an Office of Fair Trading inquiry into the level of supplements charged on Scottish holiday flights.
S1M-457 Scottish Flight Supplements (lodged on 24 January 2000) Fiona Hyslop*, Michael Russell*, Fergus Ewing*

S1M-457 Mr Kenny MacAskill: Scottish Flight Supplements—That the Parliament notes the outrageous flight supplements charged on holiday flights from Scotland; acknowledges that there is no justification for the supplements currently administered on Scottish flights; and calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government in support of an Office of Fair Trading inquiry into the level of supplements charged on Scottish holiday flights. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop, Michael Russell, Fergus Ewing
S1M-457 Scottish Flight Supplements (lodged on 24 January 2000) Shona Robison*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-457 Scottish Flight Supplements (lodged on 24 January 2000) Brian Adam*, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-457 Scottish Flight Supplements (lodged on 24 January 2000) Mr Gil Paterson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-457 Scottish Flight Supplements (lodged on 24 January 2000) Ms Sandra White*
